paragraph.heading: 2Compiling

list.item: Choose Open Project from the File menu.
Clicking open loads the selected project
Choose the location where the project will be compiled, by default the same directory containing the configuration file.

paragraph.heading: 2Running
paragraph.paragraph:
After launching the program, a window will appear with a custom ON_OFF_CONTROL control displayed. Clicking on this control will cause its state to change. If you select one of the options from the "Windows" menu, that type of window will be displayed.
2Under the Hood
The ON_OFF_CONTROL inherits ../../reference/wel_control_window_chart.xmlWEL_CONTROL_WINDOW and demonstrates how to build your controls. The classes MODAL and MODELESS inherit ../../reference/wel_modal_dialog_chart.xmlWEL_MODAL_DIALOG and ../../reference/wel_modeless_dialog_chart.xmlWEL_MODELESS_DIALOG respectively. This sample contains the following classes:
APPLICATION_IDS
MAIN_WINDOW
MODAL
MODELESS
ON_OFF_CONTROL
WINDOWS_DEMO
